data.prayer: Father, move the 638 believers in the county of Kohat to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Kohat, N.W.F.P., Pakistan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the county of Kohat.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage those who are afraid in Kohat, N.W.F.P., Pakistan that you are the healer and you are the Savior.
data.verse: Heal me, Lord, and I will be healed; save me and I will be saved, for you are the one I praise.

data.prayer: Father, put your Bible in the hands of the 225,874, who are far from you and live in this place.
data.verse: How can a young person stay on the path of purity? By living according to your Word. I seek you with all my heart; do not let me stray from your commands.

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Jat Aulak (Muslim traditions) people. Make the Jat Aulak (Muslim traditions) people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the county of Kohat.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Kohat, N.W.F.P., Pakistan to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.section_summary:
the county of Kohat, N.W.F.P., Pakistan has a population of 228,800.

We estimate Kohat has 638 people who might know Jesus, 2,288 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 225,874 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 358 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Kohat.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
